Interface Heap<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    Author:
    Vincent J Palodichuk (e-mail me)

      • add

      • clear

      • clone

        Heap<T> clone()
        Generate a copy of this heap.

        Note:

        • Be sure to cast the return value to the proper Heap<T> type before use.
        Returns:
        The return value is a copy of this heap. Subsequent changes to the copy will not affect the original, nor vice versa.
        Throws:
        java.lang.OutOfMemoryError - Indicates that there is insufficient memory for the new heap. (non-Javadoc)
        See Also:
        Object.clone()

      • isEmpty

        Returns true if the heap is empty; otherwise, false is returned.

        Returns true if the heap is empty; otherwise, false is returned.
